B D G I K O P R S U W Y

G

getGridHeight() - Method in class GraphicsController
Returns the number of grid squares across the y axis.
getGridHeight() - Method in class WindowController
Returns the height of the grid (y-axis) in grid squares.
getGridWidth() - Method in class GraphicsController
Returns the number of grid squares across the x axis.
getGridWidth() - Method in class WindowController
Returns the width of the grid (x-axis) in grid squares.
getKeyChar() - Method in class Key
Used to obtain the integer value Java uses to represent the key.
GraphicsController - Class in <Unnamed>
Class that controls the graphics components.
GraphicsController(int, int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class GraphicsController
Constructor taking the width and height of the grid along with the size of each grid square and whether grid lines should be drawn.
GREEN - Static variable in class GraphicsController
Number representing green.
